## Quality Checklist

I have reviewed my translation against the [Quality Checklist](https://docs.onetimesecret.com/en/translations/quality-checklist):

### Core Criteria
- [ ] ‚úÖ **Completeness**: All content translated, no missing sections
- [ ] ‚úÖ **Formality Consistency**: Formal/informal address used consistently
- [ ] ‚úÖ **Terminology Standards**: Followed glossary for core terms (secret, passphrase, password, burn)
- [ ] ‚úÖ **Link Localization**: All internal links use locale prefix (e.g., `/fr/`, `/es/`)
- [ ] ‚úÖ **Markdown Formatting**: No malformed links, proper bold/italic syntax
- [ ] ‚úÖ **File Structure**: Correct directory, filename matches source
- [ ] ‚úÖ **Cultural Adaptation**: Examples/formats appropriate for locale
- [ ] ‚úÖ **Natural Language**: Translation sounds natural, not machine-translated

### Review
- [ ] Self-reviewed translation by reading aloud
- [ ] Tested all links (no 404s)
- [ ] Verified markdown renders correctly
- [ ] Spell-checked in target language
- [ ] (Optional) Peer-reviewed by another native speaker
